trans-unit.target: Associa um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> com o respectivo componente.

trans-unit.source: The ComponentGlyph class contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph.RelatedComponent%2A> property, which points back to the glyph's related component.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ComponentGlyph contém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph.RelatedComponent%2A>propriedade, quais os pontos de volta para o componente relacionados do glifo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph.RelatedComponent%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to trace <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects back to their component, such as during drag operations.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser utilizado para rastreio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>objetos de volta para os respetivos componentes, tal como durante as operações de arrastar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a mouse click at the specified point should be handled by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indica se um clique do rato no ponto de especificado deve ser processado pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation does nothing and returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: A implementação predefinida não produz qualquer efeito e devolve `null`.
